name: BurnWorld
tag_list: dvd, blu-ray, storage, optical-storage, ssd, solid-state, cloud-storage, online-storage
overview:
BurnWorld Inc. was setup to cover the optical disc storage industry with an emphasis on DVD & Blu-Ray technology. The founders set out by offering quality reviews of the software and hardware that is entering this market. Also keeping the audience informed of the latest advancements coming from the storage industry.

A media sponsor for the Storage Visions Conference which is held every year just in front of CES, BurnWorld.com is constantly staying up to date with the active players in storage.

milestones.description: BurnWorld introduced a free CD/DVD burning software called BurnOn CD/DVD. This was/is an easy to use burning and mastering application from which you can burn any data/video/audio file you have to a CD or DVD.
